canPDOMonitor.kvaser¶

Module Contents¶

Classes¶

Kvaser

Class for communicating with kvaser hardware using the kvaser canlib
canPDOMonitor.kvaser.bitrates¶
class canPDOMonitor.kvaser.Kvaser(bitrate='1M', channel=0)¶

Bases: can.Device

Class for communicating with kvaser hardware using the kvaser canlib

inherits from Device

_start(self)¶

Activates the bus, clears the queue/buffer, starts populating queue

Is responsible for reading messages on bus and passing frames to queue. This is specific to hardware, using callbacks, asyncio etc

None.

_stop(self)¶

Exits the bus and clears the queue, stop adding frames to queue

None.

_read_loop(self)¶

Started in thread. Continuously fetches all the message on device

None.

_read_messages(self)¶

Reads all the messages from device and places them in queue

None.

exception canPDOMonitor.kvaser.KvaserError(msg='Kvaser Error')¶

Bases: Exception

Common base class for all non-exit exceptions.
